versiculos.texto: 'Iki 'Amuxi kaniniukieyatini[cite: 5]. Miki muxatsi wahiweme pihikitikai Tekuha paiti[cite: 5]. Mipai katiniuniere 'ixaheritsixi teiteriyari wahepaitsita[cite: 5]. 'Ana 'Utsiyaxi piti'aitametikai Kura kwieyaritsie, meta Keruwuhani Kuhatsi nu'aya 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie piti'aitametikai[cite: 6]. Yakatinikuxatakaitini huta wiyari heuyewekakaku 'akuxi kepauka kwie mutayua[cite: 7].

'Amuxi mipai kaniutayini [cite: 8]: «Yawé kaniuyutahaxiatiwani Tsiyunitsie 'uyeikati [cite: 9], Kerutsareme paiti hiwarieya pe'enierie[cite: 9]. Muxatsi wa'ixa kaniutiyinare [cite: 10], meta Kaximeru hiriyaritsie katiniukuwaukeni [cite: 11]»[cite: 9]. Kiekari hurawa mukumane hepaitsita [cite: 12]
Yawé mipai kanaineni [cite: 13, 14]: «Ramatsiku kiekatari waikawa 'axamepite'uyuri, 'ayumieme ne nepikareiyehiwirieni[cite: 15]. Karaha kwieyari memakupinaxiki [cite: 16], tepia 'uwameki[cite: 17].
'Ayumieme tai nepanuni'ani Katsaheri paratsiyuyata [cite: 18, 19], Weni-'Arari kuraruya 'aixia mi'ane mitaxitsitianiki[cite: 20, 21, 22].

Ramatsiku kiekatari wa'ituparitsie meukuwe nepeumura [cite: 23, 24], mayeweritsie nekanika'unamiki [cite: 25, 26], 'Aweni miti'aitame meta Weti-'Ereni mieme 'itsi makwe'e[cite: 27, 28, 29]. Tsiriya kiekatari wairiyarika mepanuhapanieni 'ateewa Kixi paiti»[cite: 30, 32].

Yawé mipai kanaineni[cite: 34, 36]. «Kahatsa kiekatari waikawa 'axamepite'uyuri, 'ayumieme ne nepikatiwareuyehiwirieni[cite: 37]. Xei nuiwariyari yunaime memiwarehapaki, 'Erumi kiekatari wahetsia mewatuanike[cite: 37],
'ayumieme tai nepanuni'ani Kahatsa kiekatari watetsariyatsie, kuraruya mitaxitsitianiki[cite: 37, 38].

'Atsiruri kiekariyaritsie miti'aita nepika'una, meta 'Atsikaruni 'itsi makwe'e nepika'una[cite: 39]. 'Ekuruni kiekatari nepiwatihutsuni nemamaki, meta piritsiteutsixi yunaiti mepukumaweriyarieni»[cite: 39]. Yawé naimekimiyiwe mipai kanaineni[cite: 40].

Yawé mipai kanaineni [cite: 41]: «Tiru kiekatari waikawa 'axamepite'uyuri 'ayumieme, ne nepikatiwareuyehiwirieni [cite: 42]: Yunaime kiekarite teiteri memehapanie meha'atikaime 'Erumi xemutuiriki, mepikahaye'eri tsepa yu'iwama wahamatia kememite'uxatakai[cite: 42].

versiculos.text: 'Ayumieme tai nepanuni'ani Tiru kiekatari watetsariyatsie [cite: 43, 44], kuraru 'aixia mi'ane mitaxitsitianiki»[cite: 45].

Yawé mipai kanaineni [cite: 46]: «'Erumi kiekatari waikawa 'axamepite'uyuri, 'ayumieme ne nepikatiwareuyehiwirieni [cite: 47, 48], mepiwareutaweiyaxia yu'iwama mewakwikuti 'ixiparaki [cite: 48, 49], mepika'uyupitia memite'uyukanenimayakaki [cite: 50], 'amepiteheuterixi meha'ati 'amepititekai meha'ati[cite: 51, 55].
'Ayumieme tai nepanuni'ani Temani kiekatari wahetsie [cite: 56, 57], Wutsira kiekatari wakuraru 'aixia mi'ane mitaxitsitianiki[cite: 58, 59].

Yawé mipai kanaineni [cite: 60]: «'Amunitsixi waikawa 'axamemite'uyuri, 'ayumieme ne nepikatiwareuyehiwirieni[cite: 61, 62]. Kariki yukwie 'amemitayeuriyaki [cite: 63], Karaha kiekatari memayehukatikatei [cite: 64, 65, 66] 'ukarawetsixi wahukatsie 'ixiparaki mepiwareuxitexia[cite: 67, 68].

'Ayumieme tai nepitaiya Xawaha kuraruyaritsie [cite: 69, 70], wakuraru 'aixia mi'ane mitaxitsitianiki [cite: 71], 'ana meputihiwani meyukwitiweti [cite: 72], teika putatirarikani nepi'enieni[cite: 73].
Tiwa'aitiwame 'ateewa paiti panuhanieni [cite: 74], meta 'iparewiwamete yunaiti»[cite: 75].

Yawé mipai kanaineni [cite: 77, 78]: «Muhawi ke'axamitiuyuri waikawa katiniuyurieni, 'ayumieme nepikareiyehiwirieni [cite: 79, 80]: 'Erumi kwieyaritsie ti'aitame 'umeteya memutitaiyaxiki [cite: 81], naxi memeyeitiaki[cite: 83],

tai nekananuni'amiki Muhawi hetsie [cite: 84, 87] Keriuti kiekariyari 'aixia mitaxitsitianiki [cite: 86, 88], tiranariyatsata mi'ane waikawa [cite: 89, 90, 91] meta me'utihiwakaku yukukuyamete meta kuxineta hayuanekaku[cite: 95].
Ti'aitame wahetsia mieme nekanikumaweriyamiki [cite: 96, 97], meta yunaiti memiparewie nepiwakwini»[cite: 98].

Yawé mipai paine [cite: 99]: Yawé mipai kanaineni[cite: 100]. «Kura ke'axamitiuyuri waikawa katiniuyurieni, 'ayumieme nepikareiyehiwirieni [cite: 101]: Miki yu'itarikatsie metewiti mepeuyexiri [cite: 102], kememite'uyuri watutsima [cite: 103], mepiku'eiri Yawé 'aitsikaya mepikaheye'atia kemitiu'aitaxi[cite: 104, 105].
'Ayumieme tai nepanuni'ani Kura hetsie [cite: 106], Kerutsareme kuraruya 'aixia mi'ane mitaxitsitianiki»[cite: 107, 108, 109].

Yawé mipai kanaineni [cite: 111]: «'Ixaheritsixi waikawa 'axakememite'uyuriki, 'ayumieme, nepikatiwareuyehiwirieni[cite: 113]. Teiteri 'aixia memite'u'iyari mepiwatua tuminiki, tixaiti memikatehexeiya, kakai xeiparitsiki mepitepata[cite: 114].

Haweri memiyia wamu'utsie mepa'uwe kwie tumuanariyari memihikitini hepai [cite: 115, 116], meta memiteheuyehiwa wahuye mepiyeitia[cite: 116]. Paapaya meta nu'aya xeime xeikia 'ukaratsi hamatia mepukahipite [cite: 116], mipai meteyurieti kenemitipatsie nekapatsiekame mepinetsi'ayeitiwa[cite: 117].

Tsepa kemi'ane mawari taiyame 'aurie mepahipite [cite: 118, 119], 'ixuriki tixaiti mikarexeiya [cite: 122] miku'eiri mitiupataxi miki mekanahipiteni [cite: 123, 124], meta winuki hipame memite'akapitiarieki hetsie mewarutiwiyaka [cite: 125, 126, 127, 128] Kakaiyari tukita kimana mekani'ieka[cite: 129].

>>Miya mekateniyurieka, tsepaneti wahetsiemieme 'amuxeutsixi nemitiwaruka'unaxi [cite: 130, 131, 132], wa'ikwaxi nekaniukawani wapaiti [cite: 133] meta wananari nekanatekixiani wahetia [cite: 134], tsepaneti 'amemutikai kariuxa hepai [cite: 135] meta tsepa memitirikawikai xiu hepai[cite: 136].
»Ne 'Ekiputu nekanixe'ayewitini [cite: 137], meta nekaniwaruwitiximekaitini huta tewiyari wiyari makumawetsie [cite: 138, 139], 'amuxeutsixi nemiye'aniki xehetsiemieme[cite: 140, 141, 142].

Meta nekaniwarunetiani Kakaiyari niukamemeta tsiere 'aitsika memuyuhiritia temari wakwiepa temama xeniwema watsata watsata[cite: 143, 144, 145, 146, 147]. ¿'Ixaheritsixi 'aku, mipai katiiyi? [cite: 148] Yawé mipai kanaineni[cite: 149].
Peru xeme winu xepiwaranu'itiaxia 'aitsika memuyihiritia [cite: 150, 151] meta Kakaiyari niukametemama xepikawarupitia nehetsiemieme memitehekiataniki[cite: 152, 153, 154, 155, 156].
»'Aixia kani'aneni, hikiri ne 'ari nekanixetipinarimeni [cite: 157, 158], kemitiyupina kaxeta tiriku 'atiti[cite: 159].

Hiki xewiti muyuta'una pikayiweni kwinimieme miranautsawe [cite: 161, 162], meta pikarenake [cite: 169], mitirikaiye tirikariyaya hawaiki [cite: 167] meta kwinimieme mireuyutamieme yutukari pikatawikweitsitiani[cite: 170, 171].
'Iriki kwinimieme mireutamiiwe pikayuta'una[cite: 172].

meta kwinimieme miranautsawe pikatawikweni [cite: 174, 175, 176], meta kawayutsie meutayeriwe pikayuta'una[cite: 178]. 'Iya tukaritsie matsi kaniyuta'unamiki [cite: 179, 180], tixaiti karapiti kwinimieme tsepaneti kuya mireuyutamiewe»[cite: 181, 182, 183, 184, 185].

Xekeneu'eni 'ixaheritsixi, 'iki Yawé niukieya kemaine nuiwari xehepaitsita [cite: 188], yunaime hetsiemieme 'Ekiputu nemiwarayewiti [cite: 189]: 2 «Xeme xeikia nekanixe'anayexeiya yunaime kwiepa memitama watsata[cite: 190]. 'Ayumieme, nekatinixe'akapitiamiki naimeki ke'axaxemite'uyuri»[cite: 190].
Pikayiwe yuhutati muhuniki yamekatexatawaweti[cite: 191].
Maye yeuta pikahayuhaxiatiwa xika tixaiti katikwaka[cite: 192]. Maye nunutsi pikaha'a yuterita xika tixaiti katikwaka[cite: 192].
Wiki winiyaritsie pika'uyewiere xika mana katiuyewieka[cite: 193, 194]. Winiyari pikakuyuane xika tixaiti katiwieriweni[cite: 195, 199].
Kuxineta kiekaritsie kaniutahitsieriwani kiekatari mipai memiteyu'iwiyaniki[cite: 200, 201]. Kiekaritsie yiki pikatiyini xika Yawé mipai kahaineni[cite: 202, 203].
Yuriki, Yawé naimekimiyiwe yiki pikatiyurieni yuniukamete katiwataxatiaweti kemitiyurieni[cite: 204, 205].
Maye xika heyutahaxiatiani, ¿kemi'ane pikatimani[cite: 206]? Xika Yawé naimekimiyiwe haniukani, ¿kemi'ane niukameyatiti pikatitaxata[cite: 207, 208]?

'Iki xeketenekuxatani kiekari 'aixia mirekukurarutiiyarie 'Atsiruri [cite: 209] meta kiekari 'aixia mi'anene 'Ekiputu mieme [cite: 210]: «Tsamariya hiriyaritetsie xekeneuyukuxeiri meke'uneniere kememitemama [cite: 211], nanaimarika kemitixuawe mana»[cite: 211]. 'Ixaheri kemiti'uximatiarieni

«Yukii 'aixia mi'aneneta memitehiniya 'inawari meta memitewanawairie hipame wairiyarika [cite: 212, 213] miki mepika'imate tita heitserie muyeikani miraniyine» [cite: 214], Yawé mipai kanaineni[cite: 215].

'Ayumieme, Yawé naimekimiyiwe mipai kanaineni [cite: 216]: «Xewiti mimetsi'aye'unie kanika'unamiki [cite: 217, 218, 219], kepemititirikaiye kamena'iwamiki 'akiekari [cite: 220, 221] meta 'apiinite kametininawairiemiki»[cite: 222].

Yawé mipai kanaineni [cite: 225]: «Muxatsi wahiweme maye kemitikunawairiwa heiwa hutame 'ikate ya naka 'etsiyeume [cite: 227], mipai 'ixaheritsixi [cite: 229], mekatenitawikweitsitiariekuni [cite: 230] Tsamariyatsie kiekari [cite: 231] yu'utá 'etsikinayaritsie xeikia meta Ramatsikutsie»[cite: 232, 233].
Yawé naimekimiyiwe mipai kanaineni [cite: 234], Kakaiyari Naimekimitirikaiye [cite: 235]: «'Iki xeketeneu'eni xeketenekuxatani Kakuwu tiiriyamama wahepaitsita[cite: 236, 237].
>>Kepauka nemirekapitiani 'axamitiuyuriki [cite: 239, 240, 241], 'Ixaheri nekanika'unamiki miratimawatire Weteri [cite: 242, 243], miratimawatire 'awateya kanakainixiamiki[cite: 244],

Nekaneti'unamiki kii muhaitinitsie mieme [cite: 245] meta witarita mieme[cite: 248]. Kanati'unixiamiki kii maripiriki [cite: 246] wit- simireukuwewiyatika [cite: 249, 250] meta waikawa kii witsimi'anene [cite: 251, 252] kwiepa kanikaxirimiki [cite: 247]»[cite: 253]. Yawé mipai kanaineni[cite: 254].

'Iki niuki xeme xekeneu'eni [cite: 256], wakaitsixi Watsani miemete [cite: 257], Tsamariya hiriyaritsie xemu'uwa [cite: 258], haweri memi'anene xemiwananaima meta tixaiti memikatehexeiya [cite: 259], yikinama mipai xemitewakihiawe [cite: 259]: «Xeketatenahapaniri tepanu'ieni»[cite: 260].

Yawé naimekimiyiwe mipai kanaineni kemitipatsieki [cite: 265, 266, 267]: «Tukari kanaye'amiki xeme xenuiwaritsie [cite: 268], 'imatirieka mieme kananuhaniemiki tepia 'utakeitsitiarieti[cite: 269, 270].
Kuraru haxawakaku xekananetiariekuni yu'utia xeheu'uti [cite: 271, 272], Heximuni hiriyaritsie xekanitiyunitiariekuni -Yawé mipai kanaineni-[cite: 273].
>>Xekenehu Weteri mana 'axaxeketeneyurieka[cite: 274]. Kirikari xekenehu manata yaxeikia 'axaxeketeneyurieka [cite: 275], ximeri xeketenemawatiweni[cite: 276],

meta hairieka tukaritsie tamamata hetsiemieme xeime xekeneyetuayani[cite: 278]. Paa mukuxanariyarie xekenetitaiyani [cite: 279, 280] pamipariyutsi mawariyari mihikitiniki meta hipame xeketeniwarutaxatia mawari memiyetuaniki kememiteyuwairiya[cite: 281, 282]. Yaxeketeneuyuri yunaiti yamemitehetimaniki [cite: 283, 284, 285], miki xeme mixenakeki 'ixaheritsixi -Yawé naimekimiyiwe mipai kanaineni-[cite: 286, 287, 288].

>>Ne haaka nekaniutixuawitiani xekiekaritetsie [cite: 290, 292], paa naitsarie memikakwakaki yanepitiuyuri xemukutetikatsie[cite: 293, 294, 295, 296]. Miyatiti, xeme nehetsia xepika'u'axia -Yawé mipai kanaineni-[cite: 297, 298].

>>Ne yanepitiuyuri mikakawiyeki kepauka meuyewekai 'akuxi haika metseri mitika'itsanatitsie[cite: 299, 303]. Xeime kiekariyaritsie pukawiyexi [cite: 304], xaitsieta hawaiki [cite: 305], xeime 'etsarita xeikia pukawiyexi [cite: 306], xaitsieta pika'ukawiyexi [cite: 306], 'ayumieme pitiutiwa[cite: 307].

Hau'erieti mekaneu'uwakaitini tsepa kemi'ane kiekari itsie teiteri haa mekuwautiweti [cite: 308], peru yaxeikia mepiteheuharikukai[cite: 309]. Miyatiti, xeme nehetsia xepika'u'axia -Yawé mipai kanaineni-[cite: 310].

>>Wa'etsaripa 'utsikari waheki nepiwaru'uximatia [cite: 311] meta mititiwaniki [cite: 312], 'utsikari naime mepiteheukuxixia waharawerita meta kaxie memiwa'etsatsie [cite: 313, 314, 315], wapiní meta wahuriwu[cite: 316]. Miyatiti, xeme nehetsia xepika'u'axia -Yawé mipai kanaineni-[cite: 317, 320].

Waikawa 'uximatiarika nepeni'a 'Ekiputu hepai[cite: 318, 319, 321]. Temari 'aixia memi'anene nepiwarukwi [cite: 322, 323, 324], wakawayutsixi yunaiti meputiwiyarie[cite: 325]. Yanepitiuyuri yutsurita memi'ikweki mikite wa'iakariyari[cite: 326]. Miyatiti, xeme xepikanetsihaye'eri -Yawé mipai kanaineni-[cite: 327, 329].

»Ne nepixe'uka'unaxi Tsuruma meta Kumuxa hepai [cite: 328, 330], tiyari xeikia xepuyuhayewaxi tai mihayewaxi hepai[cite: 331]. Miyatiti, xeme xepikanetsi'aye'eri -Yawé mipai kanaineni-[cite: 334, 336].
>>'Ixaheri, 'ayumieme nepimetika'enitsitiani [cite: 338, 339, 340], hikita yanemitiyurieniki [cite: 341, 342], 'Ixaheri, keneyukuha'aritiwani, 'akakaiyari pemanunakeki»[cite: 343, 344].

Ne nekanihikitini hiri nemitiwewiwa [cite: 345], meta 'eka nemunenetiwa [cite: 346], ne nekanihikitini tewi kemitiyurieni nemihekiata [cite: 347], meta hekiariya yiriya nemunenetiwa [cite: 349], meta kwie heima nemuyeika [cite: 350]: Yawé Kakaiyari nekatinitewaka[cite: 351, 353].

'Iki niuki xekeneu'eni, 'ixaheritsixi teiteriyari, 'iki heiwerika kwikariyari 'ahetsiemieme neminiawa [cite: 357, 358]: 2 «'Ari 'Ixaheri 'uka 'iimari kanatiweni [cite: 359], tawariri pika'anukukeni [cite: 360], yukwiepa kaniukani [cite: 360], pumaweni kemi'ane menukuhana»[cite: 361].

Yawé naimekimiyiwe mipai 'Ixaheri kwieyari katinahiaweni [cite: 362, 363]: «'Iya kiekari kuyaxa miwewienekai xeimiriyari warawititi kuyaxi [cite: 364, 365] miki xeitsienituyari warexeiyati xeikia payani [cite: 366], meta xeitsienituyari kuyaxi warawititi muyumienekai tamamata xeikia warexeiyati kanayeimiki»[cite: 370, 371, 372].
Yawé mipai 'Ixaheri kwieyari katinahiaweni: «Xekeneneutiwawa hiki 'ana xe'ayeyuyuriti xepakine[cite: 373, 374].

Peru Weteri xepikaheta'axeni [cite: 374], meta Kirikari xepikahekikani [cite: 375], meta Weritsewa xepika'uyekikani [cite: 376], miki Kirikari kananuhaniemiki 'ateewa paiti [cite: 376], meta Weteri, nitixaiti pikarayeitiarieni»[cite: 376].

Yawé xekeneutiwawa [cite: 378, 379] xe'ayeyuyuriti xemakineki [cite: 381], kapa miki tai hepai 'aneti 'ukaweniki [cite: 382], Kutse nuiwarimama wahetsie [cite: 383], tai Weteri kaniutataiyaweni[cite: 384]. Xeme nixewiti pika'itiwe [cite: 387]. tita mitiheitserie xepitehayeitiwa [cite: 388, 389] ratsiwime [cite: 390] meta 'aixia miti'ane kwiepa xepehipa[cite: 391].

Yawé Tsimanixi meta Terika puwarutiwewi [cite: 392], yiriya xawatiriya payeitiwa [cite: 393] meta tukari tikari payeitiwa[cite: 394]. Miki haa haramaratsie mieme putahiawe 'ana kwie pukahatuiya[cite: 395, 396]. Miki Yawé katinitewaka[cite: 396].
Miki, naime 'aixia mirekukurarutiiyarie nitixaiti pikarayeitiwa [cite: 397, 398] meta kii mimamariwawe 'u'unime payeitiwa[cite: 399].
Xeme xepi'uxiwe'erie tita mitiheitserie hetsie munua 'itsikate wahixie [cite: 400] meta xepixani'erie kemi'ane yuriki mitikuxata[cite: 404].

Haweri memi'anene xemiwaketsitiweki [cite: 405] meta waikawa 'anamanemeki xemitewawawirie 'ikuki meteyutuakaku [cite: 407, 408, 409], 'ayumieme xeme yutetexi kiiyarita xepika'ayeyaxe xemitiwewi [cite: 411, 412], meta winu xepika'anu'ieni yukaxietsie mieme xemika'e[cite: 413].
Ne nepitimate kepaimeme xemite'apine [cite: 414], pimiireri ke'axaxemite'uyuri[cite: 415].
'Ayumieme miya mi'aneki mitimaiwe kayuwati pita puyeika [cite: 417, 418], 'iki tukari 'aixia mika'anenekiri[cite: 419].

'Aixia miti'ane xeketenekuwawa 'axamiti'ane xepikatewautiweni [cite: 420], hiki 'ana xepu'uwani [cite: 421], mipai xe'anenekaku Yawé Kakaiyari Naimekimitirikaiye xehamatia puyeikani [cite: 422, 423], xeme kexemaitika[cite: 424].

'Axamiti'ane xeketenexani'erieka matsi 'aixia miti'ane xeketenenaki'erieka[cite: 425, 426]. Tita mitiheitserie memati'iwawiyariwatsie [cite: 427, 428, 429], mipai heiwati Yawé [cite: 431], keti'aitani Kakaiyari Naimekimitirikaiye [cite: 433, 434], Kutse nuiwarimama memuyuhayewatiwe warutinenimayata[cite: 435, 436].

'Ayumieme Yawé naimekimiyiwe, Kakaiyari Naimekimitirikaiye mipai kanaineni [cite: 440, 441]: «Naitsarie teiteri memayukuxexeiriwatsie kani'enieriemiki hiwerika [cite: 442, 443, 444], meta naitsarie kayetetsie 'uximatiarika hiwariyari puxuaweni[cite: 445, 447]. Memite'uximayatatiwe yu'etsita mepita'inierieni memiyuhiweriekaki [cite: 446, 448], meta waikawa mepita'inierieni memiwahiweritianiki [cite: 450, 452]. tsuari naitsarie kaxie haraweriyaritetsie memeutatsuawawe memititsuaniki kepauka ne mana 'ahetsia nemunuani»[cite: 456, 457, 453, 454, 455]. Yawé mipai kanaineni[cite: 458].
Xia'ui xeme, kekuta tekanitakwewieka [cite: 459], xemaitika Yawé munuaniki[cite: 460]. 'Ana kuhekiareke xepika'erieka [cite: 461] matsi yiriya kaninuamiki 'axa'anemeki[cite: 462].

Mipai katiniyimiki xewiti maye 'umakarimeti [cite: 463] matsi hutse pita mitakwani hepai [cite: 464], yatini xewiti nuame yukie yukitenie mirawiyakekai [cite: 465, 466] kuu hetsie mumei mikei hepai[cite: 467].
Yawé munuanitsie pikakuhekiare matsi pikiyire[cite: 468, 469]. Yuriki temawierika pikaxuaweni matsi pita nutuixiya puxuaweni[cite: 470].
«Ne nepi'uxiwe'erie 'ixiarari kexemite'ayexeiya [cite: 471], nepikanaki'a tsepa patsiekameki xemiyukuxexeiriwa nehetsiemieme[cite: 472].

Tsepa xeminetsi'atiiriwa mawari taiyariyari [cite: 476] meta hatsi mawariyari [cite: 477], ne nepika'itanaki'erieni [cite: 478], meta nepikaxe'enieni [cite: 479] tsepa tsikeru xeminetsi'utimawiri 'aixia temiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari[cite: 480, 481].
'Akwikari pepikanetsi'enitsitiaka [cite: 482], 'akanari yuariyaya nepikaheu'enimiki[cite: 483].
Matsi pita 'aixia miti'ane kexuaweni [cite: 484], mitiheitserie ke'uhaneni haixa mika'ukawauke hepai[cite: 485, 486, 488].
>>Teiteri 'ixaheritsixi [cite: 490], mawari xepikanetsi'uwewiri meta 'imikieri [cite: 492], makumawetsie xe'uhuti huta tewiyari wiyari[cite: 493, 494].
Hiki xeme xekanititikuni Tsikuti 'ikiyari ti'aitame xemite'iteriwa [cite: 495, 496], metatsiere Kiyuni [cite: 497], xurawetsixi wa'ikiyari xemetiti xemiwarutiwewi[cite: 498, 499].
Hiki nekanixe'anuni'amiki xemanuhapanieniki Ramatsiku yeta paiti» [cite: 500, 501], Yawé mipai kanaineni [cite: 502], Kakaiyari Naimekimitirikaiye mititewa[cite: 503, 504].
